trans: Add Or Subtract Time And Duration
Add or Subtract Time From Date
This tool allows you to "add" or "subtract" two time values. Any input fields left blank will default to 0.

Use this tool to calculate a new date and time by adding or subtracting days, hours, minutes, and seconds from a specified starting point. The result will reflect the adjusted time and date based on the entered duration.

Use this tool to add or subtract two or more time values using an expression format. Valid inputs include values followed by d (days), h (hours), m (minutes), or s (seconds). The only supported operators are + and -. For example, "1d 2h 3m 4s + 4h 5s - 2030s" is a correctly formatted expression.
Invalid syntax in time expression. Invalid segments
